Class ReviewerAssignPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • view.ReviewerAssignPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ReviewerAssignPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Holds all the components for assigning a paper to a reviewer.
    Version:
    6/3/2014
    Author:
    Nick Ames, Richard Hemingway, Tim Loverin, Yeonil Yoo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
